data.text:
@JasonCoppingAB They knew and so many died. Now you know. What are YOU going to do to hold them accountable?

https://t.co/HWyII001AU

@JasonCoppingAB They knew and so many died. Now you know. What are YOU going to do to hold them accountable?

https://t.co/HWyII001AU
@JasonCoppingAB Lie, healthy body is better. Natural immunity. Over time vax increases your chances of getting covid... great protection 🤣🤣
@JasonCoppingAB Why are you still denying Albertans this drug that work but push the vaccine which is a complete failure? https://t.co/zkwwwEdwXr

@JasonCoppingAB So when are you announcing pop-up vaccine clinics in Edmonton? It appears over the course of the pandemic, Calgary & UCP held ridings have had a far greater availability of both pop-up & mobile clinics. Certainly the UCP is not playing favorites - like hospital beds & such?
@JasonCoppingAB @GoAHealth You are so. Full of shit, criminal

@JasonCoppingAB Masking may not be mandated any longer but the idea of Smart Masking  could be promoted and encouraged to protect the vulnerable and immunocompromised. You have a chance to use your platform to help add an extra layer of protection for those most at risk. https://t.co/gvLlCX79zi

Vaccines are the most effective way for all Albertans to protect themselves as we move towards an endemic stage in our province.

Book your appointments here: https://t.co/WVwioR6l7J

#COVID19AB
